name: C. S. Tech Info Solutions
description:
CS Tech. is a website design and development company based in India delivering high quality website design, website development, internet marketing and ecommerce solutions for businesses worldwide. Since our inception in September 2003, our website design team has been developing professionally looking website for clients across the globe.
is CSTech aka ‘Retail Axis’ is a trademark that CSTech owns since 2010 and is currently accepted as a stable and robust ecommerce platform. Retaxis is an ‘all-in-one’ hosted ecommerce website solution that’s provides you with right features in the market to get your ecommerce website a real online success.
